img_text: ti Rebecca Rideal Retweeted Olly Gibbs @ollyog 1h dink Van Dyke in the original Mary Poppins and him in the new one... #MaryPoppinsReturns CK VAN DYKE Scott Bryan@scottygb 1h I find it absolutely amazing that dink Van Dyke is playing the same character in Mary Poppins Returns but this time he is nearly as old as the character he played first time round. pic.twitter.com/4InnBEXPG9
